data.text: @RSASIU @dwaine_van @GovernmentZA Disciplinary/suspension is certainly not effective for these government thieves. They quietly go back to their offices and continue as if nothing has happened. Why is there no recourse whatsoever for the taxpayer??? This is painful.
@tlmlotshwa @RSASIU @errolbsk @GovernmentZA Like all politicians who have nothing to offer except lying and thievery

@SiviweG_ @RSASIU @errolbsk @GovernmentZA To think that #PatriciaDeLille used to me a moral compass, until she became another Anc leeches is astounding! One cannot recognise her anymore! #PatriciaDeLiar
@RSASIU @GovernmentZA Excellent news keep up the great work
